sources: southleft-ds-mcp: Design Systems Directories (60+ design systems analyzed)

requiredBooleanProps.name: disabled
requiredBooleanProps.description: Prevents interaction and signals unavailability to assistive tech

requiredBooleanProps.name: loading
requiredBooleanProps.description: Triggers spinner and disables interaction to prevent double-click during async operations

codeOnlyProps.name: onClick
codeOnlyProps.description: Primary action handler — triggers action or event like form submission, dialog opening, or delete operation

codeOnlyProps.name: onFocus
codeOnlyProps.description: Focus event for keyboard navigation feedback

codeOnlyProps.name: onKeyDown
codeOnlyProps.description: Keyboard event handler for custom key interactions

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Required when button has no visible text (icon-only buttons). Must provide descriptive label for screen readers

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-disabled
codeOnlyProps.description: Communicates disabled state to assistive tech while keeping element focusable

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-pressed
codeOnlyProps.description: For toggle buttons — indicates current pressed state

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-expanded
codeOnlyProps.description: For menu buttons — indicates whether controlled element is expanded or collapsed

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-haspopup
codeOnlyProps.description: Indicates button opens a menu, listbox, dialog, or other popup

codeOnlyProps.name: tabIndex
codeOnlyProps.description: Keyboard focusability — set to -1 to remove from tab order

codeOnlyProps.name: className
codeOnlyProps.description: Allows parent injection of layout styles

codeOnlyProps.name: type
codeOnlyProps.description: Semantic HTML button type — prevents accidental form submission

codeOnlyProps.name: as
codeOnlyProps.description: Polymorphic tag — renders as <a> for link-buttons

requiredBooleanProps.name: disabled
requiredBooleanProps.description: Prevents editing and signals unavailability

requiredBooleanProps.name: error
requiredBooleanProps.description: Triggers error styling and aria-invalid

requiredBooleanProps.name: required
requiredBooleanProps.description: Marks field as required for form validation

requiredBooleanProps.name: readOnly
requiredBooleanProps.description: Allows focusing but prevents editing — differs from disabled in that value is still submitted

codeOnlyProps.name: onChange
codeOnlyProps.description: Value change handler for controlled input

codeOnlyProps.name: onBlur
codeOnlyProps.description: Blur handler — often triggers validation

codeOnlyProps.name: onSubmit
codeOnlyProps.description: For search inputs — handles Enter key submission

codeOnlyProps.name: onKeyDown
codeOnlyProps.description: Keyboard event handler for custom key interactions

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Required when no visible <label> is associated

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-describedby
codeOnlyProps.description: Links to helper/error text element ID for screen readers

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-invalid
codeOnlyProps.description: Must be true when error state is active

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-errormessage
codeOnlyProps.description: Points to element ID containing error message text

codeOnlyProps.name: id
codeOnlyProps.description: Required for <label htmlFor> pairing

codeOnlyProps.name: name
codeOnlyProps.description: Required for form submission

codeOnlyProps.name: value
codeOnlyProps.description: Controlled value

codeOnlyProps.name: defaultValue
codeOnlyProps.description: Uncontrolled default

codeOnlyProps.name: autoComplete
codeOnlyProps.description: Browser autocomplete hint — improves UX for common field types

codeOnlyProps.name: maxLength
codeOnlyProps.description: Maximum character limit

codeOnlyProps.name: pattern
codeOnlyProps.description: Regex validation pattern for native form validation

requiredBooleanProps.name: interactive
requiredBooleanProps.description: Signals the card is clickable — triggers hover/focus styles and requires onClick, tabIndex, keyboard handling

codeOnlyProps.name: onClick
codeOnlyProps.description: Required if card is interactive

codeOnlyProps.name: onKeyDown
codeOnlyProps.description: Required for keyboard activation on interactive cards (Enter/Space)

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Describes the card's purpose when no heading is present

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-describedby
codeOnlyProps.description: Links to card description or summary content

codeOnlyProps.name: role
codeOnlyProps.description: Semantic role — use 'button' for fully interactive cards, 'article' for content cards

codeOnlyProps.name: tabIndex
codeOnlyProps.description: Required if card is interactive

codeOnlyProps.name: as
codeOnlyProps.description: Polymorphic tag — use 'a' for link cards, 'article' for content cards

requiredBooleanProps.name: disabled
requiredBooleanProps.description: Non-interactive state — appears faded/greyed out, not available for interaction

requiredBooleanProps.name: error
requiredBooleanProps.description: Error state — indicates selection needs to be made or current selection is invalid

requiredBooleanProps.name: indeterminate
requiredBooleanProps.description: Mixed/partially-checked condition — used in hierarchical checkboxes to indicate partial selection among related items

codeOnlyProps.name: onChange
codeOnlyProps.description: Toggles state between selected and unselected

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Required when checkbox has no visible label — describes the binary choice

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-checked
codeOnlyProps.description: Tri-state: true/false/mixed. Mixed state for hierarchical partial selection

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-describedby
codeOnlyProps.description: Links to description text supplementing the label

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-required
codeOnlyProps.description: Indicates the checkbox must be checked before form submission

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-invalid
codeOnlyProps.description: Must be true when error state is active

codeOnlyProps.name: role
codeOnlyProps.description: Native checkbox role — override only for custom implementations

codeOnlyProps.name: id
codeOnlyProps.description: Required for <label htmlFor> pairing

codeOnlyProps.name: name
codeOnlyProps.description: Required for form submission

codeOnlyProps.name: checked
codeOnlyProps.description: Controlled checked state

codeOnlyProps.name: defaultChecked
codeOnlyProps.description: Uncontrolled default checked state

codeOnlyProps.name: value
codeOnlyProps.description: Value submitted with form when checked

requiredBooleanProps.name: disabled
requiredBooleanProps.description: Non-interactive state — displayed as greyed out or visually muted

codeOnlyProps.name: onChange
codeOnlyProps.description: Toggle handler — switch has instantaneous effect, no separate save action needed

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Required — describes the setting being toggled (e.g. 'Enable notifications')

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-checked
codeOnlyProps.description: Binary on/off state — must reflect current visual state

codeOnlyProps.name: role
codeOnlyProps.description: WAI-ARIA switch role — distinguishes from checkbox (immediate vs deferred action)

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-describedby
codeOnlyProps.description: Links to additional description of what the switch controls

codeOnlyProps.name: checked
codeOnlyProps.description: Controlled on/off state

codeOnlyProps.name: defaultChecked
codeOnlyProps.description: Uncontrolled default state

requiredBooleanProps.name: disabled
requiredBooleanProps.description: Non-interactive state for the radio button

requiredBooleanProps.name: error
requiredBooleanProps.description: Error state — indicates an issue with the selection

codeOnlyProps.name: onChange
codeOnlyProps.description: Selection change handler — only one radio in a group can be selected at a time

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Required when no visible label — labels are crucial for radio buttons

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-checked
codeOnlyProps.description: Selected state of the radio button

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-describedby
codeOnlyProps.description: Links to optional description text

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-required
codeOnlyProps.description: Indicates a selection must be made in the radio group

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-invalid
codeOnlyProps.description: Error state for the radio group

codeOnlyProps.name: role
codeOnlyProps.description: Semantic role — group container should use role='radiogroup'

codeOnlyProps.name: id
codeOnlyProps.description: Required for <label htmlFor> pairing

codeOnlyProps.name: name
codeOnlyProps.description: Groups radio buttons together — only one per name can be selected

codeOnlyProps.name: value
codeOnlyProps.description: The value associated with this radio option

codeOnlyProps.name: checked
codeOnlyProps.description: Controlled selection state

requiredBooleanProps.name: disabled
requiredBooleanProps.description: Prevents interaction with the select

requiredBooleanProps.name: error
requiredBooleanProps.description: Error state for validation feedback

requiredBooleanProps.name: open
requiredBooleanProps.description: Controls whether the dropdown list is expanded

codeOnlyProps.name: onChange
codeOnlyProps.description: Selection change handler

codeOnlyProps.name: onOpenChange
codeOnlyProps.description: Callback when dropdown opens/closes

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Required when no visible label is associated

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-expanded
codeOnlyProps.description: Indicates whether the dropdown is open — must sync with visual state

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-haspopup
codeOnlyProps.description: Indicates the select has an associated popup

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-activedescendant
codeOnlyProps.description: ID of currently highlighted option for screen readers

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-invalid
codeOnlyProps.description: Must be true when error state is active

codeOnlyProps.name: role
codeOnlyProps.description: For custom selects — native <select> has implicit role

codeOnlyProps.name: id
codeOnlyProps.description: Required for <label htmlFor> pairing

codeOnlyProps.name: name
codeOnlyProps.description: Required for form submission

codeOnlyProps.name: value
codeOnlyProps.description: Currently selected value

codeOnlyProps.name: defaultValue
codeOnlyProps.description: Uncontrolled default selection

codeOnlyProps.name: placeholder
codeOnlyProps.description: Placeholder text when no selection is made

codeOnlyProps.name: multiple
codeOnlyProps.description: Allow multiple selections

requiredBooleanProps.name: open
requiredBooleanProps.description: Controls modal visibility — window overlaid on primary content

codeOnlyProps.name: onClose
codeOnlyProps.description: Close handler — must be provided to allow dismissal

codeOnlyProps.name: onOpenChange
codeOnlyProps.description: Callback when modal opens/closes

codeOnlyProps.name: onAfterOpen
codeOnlyProps.description: Called after modal opens — useful for focusing first interactive element

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Labels the dialog when no visible title is present

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-labelledby
codeOnlyProps.description: Points to the element ID of the modal's title — required for accessible dialog

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-describedby
codeOnlyProps.description: Points to element ID describing the dialog content

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-modal
codeOnlyProps.description: Indicates content underneath is inert — must be true for modal dialogs

codeOnlyProps.name: role
codeOnlyProps.description: Use 'alertdialog' for confirmation/destructive actions requiring immediate response

codeOnlyProps.name: tabIndex
codeOnlyProps.description: Modal container should be focusable but not in tab order

codeOnlyProps.name: trapFocus
codeOnlyProps.description: Focus must be trapped inside modal — Tab/Shift+Tab cycles within dialog

codeOnlyProps.name: closeOnOverlayClick
codeOnlyProps.description: Whether clicking the overlay/backdrop closes the modal

codeOnlyProps.name: closeOnEscape
codeOnlyProps.description: Whether pressing Escape closes the modal — expected behavior per WAI-ARIA

codeOnlyProps.name: returnFocus
codeOnlyProps.description: Returns focus to the trigger element when modal closes

requiredBooleanProps.name: disabled
requiredBooleanProps.description: Disables specific tab item — appears faded/greyed, not available for interaction

codeOnlyProps.name: onChange
codeOnlyProps.description: Tab selection change handler — only one tab active at a time

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Labels the tab list for screen readers when purpose isn't clear from context

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-selected
codeOnlyProps.description: Marks the currently active tab — must be true for selected, false for others

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-controls
codeOnlyProps.description: Each tab must point to the ID of its associated tab panel

codeOnlyProps.name: role
codeOnlyProps.description: Container uses 'tablist', items use 'tab', content uses 'tabpanel'

codeOnlyProps.name: tabIndex
codeOnlyProps.description: Active tab has tabIndex 0, inactive tabs have -1 (roving tabindex pattern)

codeOnlyProps.name: id
codeOnlyProps.description: Required for aria-controls/aria-labelledby pairing

codeOnlyProps.name: value
codeOnlyProps.description: Currently selected tab value

codeOnlyProps.name: defaultValue
codeOnlyProps.description: Default selected tab on initial render

codeOnlyProps.name: orientation
codeOnlyProps.description: Layout direction — affects arrow key navigation (left/right vs up/down)

requiredBooleanProps.name: disabled
requiredBooleanProps.description: Prevents expanding/collapsing the accordion section

requiredBooleanProps.name: expanded
requiredBooleanProps.description: Controls whether content is visible (expanded) or hidden (collapsed)

codeOnlyProps.name: onChange
codeOnlyProps.description: Expand/collapse toggle handler

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-expanded
codeOnlyProps.description: Indicates whether the controlled section is expanded or collapsed

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-controls
codeOnlyProps.description: Points to the ID of the expandable content panel

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Accessible name for the accordion when title isn't sufficient

codeOnlyProps.name: role
codeOnlyProps.description: Expanded panel should use role='region' with aria-labelledby pointing to header

codeOnlyProps.name: id
codeOnlyProps.description: Required for aria-controls/aria-labelledby pairing

codeOnlyProps.name: defaultExpanded
codeOnlyProps.description: Whether the section is expanded on initial render

codeOnlyProps.name: allowMultiple
codeOnlyProps.description: Whether multiple sections can be expanded simultaneously

requiredBooleanProps.name: dismissible
requiredBooleanProps.description: Whether the alert can be dismissed by the user

codeOnlyProps.name: onDismiss
codeOnlyProps.description: Handler called when alert is dismissed

codeOnlyProps.name: onAction
codeOnlyProps.description: Handler for the primary action button within the alert

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-label
codeOnlyProps.description: Accessible name when alert content isn't self-describing

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-live
codeOnlyProps.description: Controls how screen readers announce the alert — 'assertive' interrupts, 'polite' waits

codeOnlyProps.name: role
codeOnlyProps.description: Semantic role — 'alert' for important messages, 'status' for non-urgent updates

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-atomic
codeOnlyProps.description: Screen reader announces entire alert region, not just changes

codeOnlyProps.name: variant
codeOnlyProps.description: Visual severity/type of the alert

codeOnlyProps.name: autoClose
codeOnlyProps.description: Duration in ms before auto-dismissal (for toasts/snackbars)

requiredBooleanProps.name: visible
requiredBooleanProps.description: Controls tooltip visibility — shows on hover/focus by default

codeOnlyProps.name: onOpenChange
codeOnlyProps.description: Callback when tooltip shows/hides

codeOnlyProps.name: aria-describedby
codeOnlyProps.description: Trigger element must point to the tooltip ID via aria-describedby

codeOnlyProps.name: role
codeOnlyProps.description: WAI-ARIA tooltip role — popup that displays on hover/focus

codeOnlyProps.name: id
codeOnlyProps.description: Required — trigger references this via aria-describedby

codeOnlyProps.name: content
codeOnlyProps.description: Tooltip text content

codeOnlyProps.name: placement
codeOnlyProps.description: Preferred tooltip position relative to trigger

codeOnlyProps.name: delay
codeOnlyProps.description: Delay in ms before showing tooltip on hover
